edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.utility
Interface SigmaCommonInput

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ZKCommonInput
All Known Implementing Classes:
SigmaANDCommonInput, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueCommonInput, SigmaDHCommonInput, SigmaDHExtendedCommonInput, SigmaDJEncryptedValueCommonInput, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroCommonInput, SigmaDJProductCommonInput, SigmaDlogCommonInput, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeCommonInput, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueCommonInput, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueCommonInput, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyCommonInput, SigmaORMultipleCommonInput, SigmaORTwoCommonInput, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeCommonInput, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueCommonInput
public interface SigmaCommonInput
extends ZKCommonInput, java.io.Serializable

Marker interface for common input of Sigma Protocols.

Each Sigma Protocol has a common input for the prover and the verifier, such input should implement this interface.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
